sourcesContent:
<template>
    <g class="re-node">
        <rect class="node-rect" :class="{'highlighted': getNodeHighlightState, 'defined': getNodeDefineState}" 
            :style="nodeStyle()"
            width="30" height="30" 
            :transform="nodeTransform" 
            :key = "rectKey"
            @click="updateSelectedNode"
            @dblclick="updateSelectedPart"/>
        <path v-if="nodeExpression['notFlag']" :d="notCompute" @click="updateSelectedNode" :style="upperStyle()" />
        <circle v-if="nodeExpression['notFlag']" :cx="nodeExpression['notX']" :cy="nodeExpression['notY']+27" r="1.5" :style="notStyle()" />
        <path v-if="nodeExpression['or']" :d="orCompute" @click="updateSelectedNode" />
        <g v-if="nodeExpression['branch']">
            <path :d="leftBracketBranchCompute" @click="updateSelectedNode"/>
            <path :d="rightBracketBranchCompute" @click="updateSelectedNode"/>
            <text v-if="checkBranchRepeat()" 
                :transform="branchRepeatTransform" 
                style="alignment-baseline: hanging;"
                @click="updateSelectedNode">
                {{nodeExpression['branchRepeat'][0]}}..{{nodeExpression['branchRepeat'][1]}}
            </text>
        </g>
        <text v-if="checkRepeat()" 
            :transform="repeatTransform" 
            style="alignment-baseline: hanging;"
        >
            {{nodeExpression['repeat'][0]}}..{{nodeExpression['repeat'][1]}}
        </text>
        <rect class="repeat-rect" v-if="checkRepeat()" width="15" height="10" :transform="repeatTransform" @click="updateRepeat()"></rect>
        <rect class="upper-rect" v-if="nodeExpression['upper']" width="10" height="10" :transform="upperTransform" :style="upperStyle()" @click="updateRepeat()"/>
        <path v-if="nodeExpression['selected']" :d="selectedCompute" />
        <text 
            :v-if="checkName()"
            class="node-name"
            :style="nameStyle()"
            :x = "textX"
            :y = "textY"
            text-anchor= "middle"
            alignment-baseline= "middle"
            @click="updateSelectedNode">
            {{nodeExpression['nodeName']}}
        </text>


    </g>
    
</template>

<script>
    import { mapState, mapMutations } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'RENode',
  components: {
    
  },
  props: {
    nodeExpression:{
      type: Object
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
        rectKey: 0
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    //console.log('nodeExpression', this.nodeExpression)
  },
  watch: {
      displayMode: function() {
        console.log('displayMode')
      },
      nodeDefinitionState: function(){
        this.rectKey = (this.rectKey + 1) % 2
      }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState([
      'displayMode',
      'selectedDom',
      'selectedDomKey',
      'nodeDefinitionState'
    ]),
    getNodeHighlightState () {
        return this.nodeExpression.key === this.selectedDomKey
    },
    getNodeDefineState(){
        if('definition' in this.nodeExpression){
            if(this.nodeExpression['definition'])
                return true
        }
    },
    nodeTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.nodeExpression['x']}, ${this.nodeExpression['y']})`
    },
    labelTransform(){
        let tmpX = this.nodeExpression['x'] + 6.5
        let tmpY = this.nodeExpression['y'] + 4
        return `translate(${tmpX}, ${tmpY})`
    },
    repeatTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.nodeExpression['xRepeat']}, ${this.nodeExpression['yRepeat']})`
    },
    branchRepeatTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.nodeExpression['xBranchRepeat']}, ${this.nodeExpression['yBranchRepeat']})`
    },
    upperTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.nodeExpression['xUpper']}, ${this.nodeExpression['yUpper']})`
    },
    orCompute(){
        var x1 = this.nodeExpression['xOr']
        var y1 = this.nodeExpression['yOr']


    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" v " + 30);
    },
    notCompute(){
        var x1 = this.nodeExpression['notX']
        var y1 = this.nodeExpression['notY']
        
        return ( "M " + x1 + " " + y1 +
                 "v " + 22);
    },
    selectedCompute(){
        var x1 = this.nodeExpression['x1Selected']
        var x2 = this.nodeExpression['x2Selected']
        var y1 = this.nodeExpression['ySelected']

        return ( "M " + x1 + " " + y1 + 
                 "H " + x2)
    },
    leftBracketBranchCompute()
	{

        var x1 = this.nodeExpression['x1LeftBranchBracket']
        var y1 = this.nodeExpression['y1LeftBranchBracket'] + 6
        var x2 = this.nodeExpression['x2LeftBranchBracket']
        var y2 = this.nodeExpression['y2LeftBranchBracket'] - 6

        var midx = x1-(y2-y1)/2
        var midy = (y2+y1)/2

    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" L " + midx + " " + midy + 
                " L " + x2+ " " + y2  );
    },
    rightBracketBranchCompute()
	{
        var x1 = this.nodeExpression['x1RightBranchBracket']
        var y1 = this.nodeExpression['y1RightBranchBracket'] + 6
        var x2 = this.nodeExpression['x2RightBranchBracket']
        var y2 = this.nodeExpression['y2RightBranchBracket'] - 6

        var midx = x1+(y2-y1)/2
        var midy = (y2+y1)/2

    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" L " + midx + " " + midy + 
                " L " + x2+ " " + y2  );
    },
    textX(){
        return this.nodeExpression['x'] + 15
    },
    textY(){
        return this.nodeExpression['y'] + 17
    }
   
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations([
      'UPDATE_SELECTED_DOM',
      'UPDATE_NODE_DEFINITION_STATE',
      'UPDATE_REPEAT_DOM',
      'UPDATE_SELECTED_PART'
    ]),
    checkRepeat() {
        if('repeat' in this.nodeExpression)
            if(this.nodeExpression['repeat'][0]!=1 || this.nodeExpression['repeat'][1]!=1){
                        return true
            }
        return false
    },
    checkBranchRepeat() {
        if('branchRepeat' in this.nodeExpression)
            if(this.nodeExpression['branchRepeat'][0]!=1 || this.nodeExpression['branchRepeat'][1]!=1)
                return true
        return false
    },
    checkName(){
        if('nodeName' in this.nodeExpression){
            return true
        }
        return false
    },
    updateSelectedNode() {
        this.UPDATE_NODE_DEFINITION_STATE()
        this.UPDATE_SELECTED_DOM(this.nodeExpression)
    },
    updateSelectedPart(){
        if('selected' in this.nodeExpression){
            this.nodeExpression['selected'] = !this.nodeExpression['selected']
        }
        else{
            this.nodeExpression['selected'] = true
        }
        this.UPDATE_SELECTED_PART()
    },
    updateRepeat() {
        this.UPDATE_REPEAT_DOM(this.nodeExpression)
    },
    nodeStyle(){
        if('definition' in this.nodeExpression){
            if(this.nodeExpression['definition']){
                if(this.nodeExpression.key === this.selectedDomKey){
                    return ( "stroke: red !important; "  + 
                             "fill: " + this.nodeExpression['nodeColor'] + "; "+
                             "stroke-dasharray: 0 0; " + 
                             "stroke-width: 1;"
                    )
                }
                return (
                   "fill: " + this.nodeExpression['nodeColor'] + "; " + 
                    "stroke-dasharray: 0 0; " + 
                    "stroke-width: 1;"
                )

            }
        }
        if(this.nodeExpression.key === this.selectedDomKey){
            return ( "stroke: red !important"  );
        }
        return (
            "stroke: #c4bbbb; " + 
            "stroke-width: 2; " + 
            "stroke-dasharray: 4 2;" + 
            "fill: white; "
        )

    },
    upperStyle(){
        if(this.nodeExpression.key == this.selectedDomKey){
            return ( "stroke: red !important"  );
        }
    },
    notStyle(){
        if(this.nodeExpression.key == this.selectedDomKey){
            return ( "stroke: red !important; " +
                     "fill: red" 
                    );
        }
    },
    nameStyle(){
        if(!this.nodeExpression['nodeColor']|| this.nodeExpression['nodeColor'] == "" || this.nodeExpression['nodeColor'] == "#FFFFFF"){
            return "fill: black !important;"
        }
        else return "fill: white !important;"
    }

  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="less">
.re-node {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;

}
path {
    stroke: #000000;
    stroke-width: 2px;
    fill: none;
}
.node-rect {
    stroke: #c4bbbb;
    stroke-width: 2;
    stroke-dasharray: 4 2;
    fill: rgb(255, 255, 255);

    // &.defined{
    //     stroke: #000000;
    //     stroke-width: 3;
    //     stroke-dasharray: 0 0;
    //     fill: white;
    // }
}
.upper-rect {
    stroke: #c4bbbb;
    stroke-width: 2;
    stroke-dasharray: 2 1.67 3 1.67 3 1.67 2 0.0001;
    fill: white;
}
.repeat-rect{
    opacity: 0;
}
</style>

<style scoped lang="less">
.node-name { 
    fill: white; 
    font-size: 13px;
}
</style>
